title: SEX LOVE FRIENDS & THE COFFEE SHOP: When the cost of first time love, could mean hurting the ones clostest to you...
description: Erotic Romance, with a twist!  Trina Jamerson, is a Law Student that has never let life's usual obstacles get in the way of her dreams. Graduating top of her class and becoming the youngest lawyer at a law firm of her chose, was more important than, friends, love and sex.  That was until she decided to get a part-time job at, a coffee shop. Trina experiences all of her fist and a little more than expected. A once friendless, loveless, virgin found a friend, love and sex and, Trina realizes that everyone she has let into her circle may not be what they appear to be.
author: M.D.  Smith
